title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6053.3 - Right to review record information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6053.3 - Right to review record information

State Regulations

The subject of juvenile history record information shall
have the same right to review and challenge the contents of his or her own
record as an adult has pursuant to Part 6050 of this Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6053.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
